trans-unit.source: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.
trans-unit.target: 用于描述三维对象的大小的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>不通常会使用在 XAML 中，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to determine if two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structures are equal using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何确定如果两个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构是相等使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>静态<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to check <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何检查<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>是否相等的结构。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构是声明并分配值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Equals%2A> method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Equals%2A>方法然后用于确定两个结构是否相等。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>值必须为非负数。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>设置为 0 的值不为空。

trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>值设置为负无穷大。

trans-unit.target: 这是唯一一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构可以具有负值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure and whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> are equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> properties of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构，以及指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 属性是否与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 属性相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个实例相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure and is identical with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构且与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Double>在它们，比较两个执行算术运算时，值可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>逻辑上相等的实例可能会失败。

trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 属性的值不同，则两个结构不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> coordinates of <paramref name="size1" /> and <paramref name="size2" /> are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="size1" /> 和 <paramref name="size2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 坐标不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Double>在它们，比较两个执行算术运算时，值可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>逻辑上相等的实例可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded inequality operator to check if two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用重载的不相等运算符将检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the three-dimensional size structure.
trans-unit.target: 三维大小结构的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a three-dimensional size structure into the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将三维大小结构的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示形式转换为等效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 等效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to turn a string representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何启用的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>到<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构。

trans-unit.source: The string specifying the format to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，表示使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="IFormatProvider" /> to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化该值的 <see langword="IFormatProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息的 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含此 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" />。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure is empty, the string "empty" is returned, rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构为空，则返回字符串"empty"，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get a string representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 区域性特定的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含此 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z" /> 值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" />。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure is empty, the string "empty" is returned, rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构为空，则返回字符串"empty"，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" /> value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" /> value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A>值必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>不通常会使用在 XAML 中，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check if two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to assign values to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何将值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>结构时为其声明结构以及后已被声明为结构。
